content.rendered:
Photo by Jacob Kiesow

New themes to fire your creativity on StudioPress and WP Studio. Plus, details of a Genesis Meetup planned for WordCamp Manchester (UK).

Themes

StudioPress release their latest theme, Boss Pro (demo), a third party theme made by the folk at Bloom.

Introducing Boss Pro: Turn Your Dreams Into Plans

See it here: https://t.co/PNoFGfzP6s#genesiswp

— StudioPress (@studiopress) August 2, 2017

The latest theme from Frank at WP Studio is out and, as usual, it doesn’t disappoint. Havana (demo) is a portfolio theme for ‘photographers and creative minds’.

Say hello to Havana A #GenesisWP Portfolio Theme for Photographers and Creative Minds #WordPress #wordpressthemes https://t.co/NIpD3cbmUu pic.twitter.com/2hgOjkJoUk

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) July 31, 2017

Showcase

Bill Erickson for solutionsiq.com

Excited to launch @SolutionsIQ new website! Check it out: https://t.co/jaw752vU23

— Bill Erickson (@BillErickson) August 3, 2017

Spinifex Media for soulsurftravel.com

Our biggest project to date, we're stoked to launch this rebuild of https://t.co/vco8GpqlCZ Lots of love, ACF, and of course #genesiswp! pic.twitter.com/DzU1hb6z3l

— Spinifex Media (@spnfxmedia) August 1, 2017

Claire Cheyne with a new site for swmummy.co.uk

New project launch for SW Mummy this week. Using the amazing combo of #genesiswp and @BeaverBuilder https://t.co/M2Tz512GpS pic.twitter.com/XDRtpK2fXT

— Claire Cheyne (@wildflowerspix) August 5, 2017

Matt Whiteley, who many of you will know for his Genesis themes, has redesigned his site, whiteleydesigns.com

The facelift for my #genesiswp site is complete and the deployment is done! Easier navigation and more white space. https://t.co/kFKpzJZBNb pic.twitter.com/kbqMTe3XU3

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) July 31, 2017

Best of the rest

Srihar Katakam shows you how to use FacetWP (one of my favorite plugins) and WooCommerce together.

@FacetWP + #WooCommerce in #GenesisWP:https://t.co/M2rT9NHEKS pic.twitter.com/66Oa2NbdDd

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) August 5, 2017

Bill Erickson spoke at Post Status’ Publish conference on making your freelancing business more profitable.

Great interview w/ Bill Erickson @BillErickson by @Krogsgard at #publishconf #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/EpcBINHPV3

— Birgit Pauli-Haack (@bph) August 3, 2017

And finally…

If you’re going to WordCamp Manchester be sure to go to the UK Genesis meetup on 27 October (and make sure you book in advance).

Going to WordCamp Manchester?

Use the Genesis Framework?

Come to our #UKGenesis meetup!https://t.co/pVQjj2eaH8#genesiswp #wcmcr

— UK Genesis (@UKGenesis) July 31, 2017

That’s all for this week.

Got something to share? Post it via the homepage.

Want to join the cool kids? I can’t help you with that, but you can subscribe.

excerpt.rendered: New themes to fire your creativity on StudioPress and WP Studio.
